webResources.textAttributionSnippet: (en) Portrait of Eduard Andersson. Born in Great Malm, he came to Lköpping in 1847, not yet filled 14 years. He took up duty as a manager at the merchant Möller. Through diligence and endeavour, he advanced to a bookkeeper and in the late 1850s managed to take over the movement. Over time, Eduard Andersson’s Garn- and Tissue trade was very successful. The trade was driven from a beautiful house at the current address Storgatan 52. In 1860 he married Anna Johanna Augusta Kullgren - https://www.europeana.eu/item/73/S_OM_photo_OMEA0001240026. Rydholm, Svante Leonard. Östergötlands museum - http://digitaltmuseum.se/021017436660. Public Domain Mark - http://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/mark/1.0/
